verses.verse: יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah מָלַ֗ךְ <WH4427> began to reign בֶּן־ <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> and twenty וְחָמֵשׁ֙ <WH2568> [when he was] five שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> and twenty וָתֵ֙שַׁע֙ <WH8672> nine שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> And his mother's אֲבִיָּ֖ה <WH29> [was] Abijah בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter זְכַרְיָֽהוּ׃ <WH2148> of Zechariah

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> had done דָּוִ֥יד <WH1732> according to all that David אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> his father

ה֣וּא <WH1931> he בַשָּׁנָה֩ <WH8141> year הָרִאשׁוֹנָ֨ה <WH7223> He in the first לְמָלְכ֜וֹ <WH4427> of his reign בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <WH7223> in the first פָּתַ֛ח <WH6605> opened אֶת־ <WH853> דַּלְת֥וֹת <WH1817> the doors בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַֽיְחַזְּקֵֽם׃ <WH2388> and repaired

וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> And he brought in אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> the priests וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> and the Levites וַיַּֽאַסְפֵ֖ם <WH622> and gathered them together לִרְח֥וֹב <WH7339> street הַמִּזְרָֽח׃ <WH4217> into the east

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And said לָהֶ֖ם שְׁמָע֣וּנִי <WH8085> unto them Hear הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> me ye Levites עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> now הִֽתְקַדְּשׁ֗וּ <WH6942> sanctify וְקַדְּשׁוּ֙ <WH6942> now yourselves and sanctify אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1> of your fathers וְהוֹצִ֥יאוּ <WH3318> and carry forth אֶת־ <WH853> הַנִּדָּ֖ה <WH5079> the filthiness מִן־ <WH4480> from הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> out of the holy

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מָעֲל֣וּ <WH4603> have trespassed אֲבֹתֵ֗ינוּ <WH1> For our fathers וְעָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> and done הָרַ֛ע <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the eyes יְהוָֽה־ <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> our God וַיַּֽעַזְבֻ֑הוּ <WH5800> and have forsaken וַיַּסֵּ֧בּוּ <WH5437> him and have turned away פְנֵיהֶ֛ם <WH6440> their faces מִמִּשְׁכַּ֥ן <WH4908> from the habitation יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> and turned עֹֽרֶף׃ <WH6203> [their] backs

גַּ֣ם <WH1571> have also סָֽגְר֞וּ <WH5462> Also they have shut up דַּלְת֣וֹת <WH1817> the doors הָאוּלָ֗ם <WH197> of the porch וַיְכַבּוּ֙ <WH3518> and put out אֶת־ <WH853> הַנֵּר֔וֹת <WH5216> the lamps וּקְטֹ֖רֶת <WH7004> incense לֹ֣א <WH3808> not הִקְטִ֑ירוּ <WH6999> and have not burned וְעֹלָה֙ <WH5930> burnt offerings לֹא־ <WH3808> or הֶעֱל֣וּ <WH5927> nor offered בַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> in the holy לֵאלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> [place] unto the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become קֶ֣צֶף <WH7110> Wherefore the wrath יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> was against יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> was upon Judah וִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem וַיִּתְּנֵ֤ם <WH5414> and he hath delivered [לִזְוָעָה כ] (לְזַֽעֲוָה֙ <WH2113> be removed ק) לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <WH8047> to astonishment וְלִשְׁרֵקָ֔ה <WH8322> and to hissing כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you רֹאִ֖ים <WH7200> as ye see בְּעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5869> with your eyes

וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> behold נָפְל֥וּ <WH5307> have fallen אֲבוֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH1> For lo our fathers בֶּחָ֑רֶב <WH2719> by the sword וּבָנֵ֨ינוּ <WH1121> and our sons וּבְנוֹתֵ֧ינוּ <WH1323> and our daughters וְנָשֵׁ֛ינוּ <WH802> and our wives בַּשְּׁבִ֖י <WH7628> [are] in captivity עַל־ <WH5921> and זֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now עִם־ <WH5973> is in לְבָבִ֔י <WH3824> Now [it is] in mine heart לִכְר֣וֹת <WH3772> to make בְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> a covenant לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> with the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְיָשֹׁ֥ב <WH7725> may turn away מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> that חֲר֥וֹן <WH2740> that his fierce אַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH639> wrath

בָּנַ֕י <WH1121> My sons עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now אַל־ <WH408> be not תִּשָּׁל֑וּ <WH7952> be not now negligent כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בָכֶ֞ם בָּחַ֣ר <WH970> young יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God לַעֲמֹ֤ד <WH5975> you to stand לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> before לְשָׁ֣רְת֔וֹ <WH8334> him to serve וְלִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become ל֖וֹ מְשָׁרְתִ֥ים <WH8334> him and that ye should minister וּמַקְטִרִֽים׃ <WH6999> unto him and burn incense ס

וַיָּקֻ֣מוּ <WH6965> arose הַ֠לְוִיִּם <WH3881> Then the Levites מַ֣חַת <WH4287> Mahath בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲמָשַׂ֞י <WH6022> of Amasai וְיוֹאֵ֣ל <WH3100> and Joel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲזַרְיָהוּ֮ <WH5838> of Azariah מִן־ <WH4480> from בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons הַקְּהָתִי֒ <WH6956> of the Kohathites וּמִן־ <WH4480> and from בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> and of the sons מְרָרִ֔י <WH4847> of Merari קִ֚ישׁ <WH7027> Kish בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַבְדִּ֔י <WH5660> of Abdi וַעֲזַרְיָ֖הוּ <WH5838> and Azariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהַלֶּלְאֵ֑ל <WH3094> of Jehalelel וּמִן־ <WH4480> and from הַגֵּ֣רְשֻׁנִּ֔י <WH1649> and of the Gershonites יוֹאָח֙ <WH3098> Joah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זִמָּ֔ה <WH2155> of Zimmah וְעֵ֖דֶן <WH5731> and Eden בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאָֽח׃ <WH3098> of Joah

וּמִן־ <WH4480> and from בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> And of the sons אֱלִ֣יצָפָ֔ן <WH469> of Elizaphan שִׁמְרִ֖י <WH8113> Shimri [וִיעוּאֵל כ] (וִיעִיאֵ֑ל <WH3273> Jeiel ק) וּמִן־ <WH4480> and from בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> and of the sons אָסָ֔ף <WH623> of Asaph זְכַרְיָ֖הוּ <WH2148> Zechariah וּמַתַּנְיָֽהוּ׃ <WH4983> and Mattaniah ס

וּמִן־ <WH4480> and from בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> And of the sons הֵימָ֖ן <WH1968> of Heman [יְחוּאֵל כ] (יְחִיאֵ֣ל <WH3171> Jehiel ק) וְשִׁמְעִ֑י <WH8096> and Shimei ס וּמִן־ <WH4480> and from בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> and of the sons יְדוּת֔וּן <WH3038> of Jeduthun שְׁמַֽעְיָ֖ה <WH8098> Shemaiah וְעֻזִּיאֵֽל׃ <WH5816> and Uzziel

וַיַּֽאַסְפ֤וּ <WH622> And they gathered אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחֵיהֶם֙ <WH251> their brethren וַיִּֽתְקַדְּשׁ֔וּ <WH6942> and sanctified וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> themselves and came כְמִצְוַת־ <WH4687> according to the commandment הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king בְּדִבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> by the words יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְטַהֵ֖ר <WH2891> to cleanse בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> went הַ֠כֹּהֲנִים <WH3548> And the priests לִפְנִ֣ימָה <WH6441> into the inner part בֵית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> of the LORD לְטַהֵר֒ <WH2891> to cleanse וַיּוֹצִ֗יאוּ <WH3318> [it] and brought out אֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and every הַטֻּמְאָה֙ <WH2932> all the uncleanness אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which מָֽצְאוּ֙ <WH4672> that they found בְּהֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> in the temple יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לַחֲצַ֖ר <WH2691> into the court בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַֽיְקַבְּלוּ֙ <WH6901> took הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> And the Levites לְהוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> [it] to carry [it] out לְנַֽחַל־ <WH5158> into the brook קִדְר֖וֹן <WH6939> Kidron חֽוּצָה׃ <WH2351> abroad

וַ֠יָּחֵלּוּ <WH2490> Now they began בְּאֶחָ֞ד <WH259> on the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשׁוֹן֮ <WH7223> [day] of the first לְקַדֵּשׁ֒ <WH6942> to sanctify וּבְי֧וֹם <WH3117> day שְׁמוֹנָ֣ה <WH8083> and on the eighth לַחֹ֗דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the month בָּ֚אוּ <WH935> came לְאוּלָ֣ם <WH197> they to the porch יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיְקַדְּשׁ֥וּ <WH6942> so they sanctified אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּית־ <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְיָמִ֣ים <WH3117> days שְׁמוֹנָ֑ה <WH8083> in eight וּבְי֨וֹם <WH3117> day שִׁשָּׁ֥ה <WH8337> six עָשָׂ֛ר <WH6240> teen לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <WH7223> day of the first כִּלּֽוּ׃ <WH3615> they made an end ס

וַיָּב֤וֹאוּ <WH935> Then they went פְנִ֙ימָה֙ <WH6441> in אֶל־ <WH413> about חִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> to Hezekiah הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said טִהַ֖רְנוּ <WH2891> We have cleansed אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> all the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֤ח <WH4196> and the altar הָעוֹלָה֙ <WH5930> of burnt offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all כֵּלָ֔יו <WH3627> with all the vessels וְאֶת־ <WH853> שֻׁלְחַ֥ן <WH7979> table הַֽמַּעֲרֶ֖כֶת <WH4635> thereof and the shewbread וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all כֵּלָֽיו׃ <WH3627> with all the vessels

וְאֵ֣ת <WH854> Moreover כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַכֵּלִ֗ים <WH3627> Moreover all the vessels אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הִזְנִיחַ֩ <WH2186> did cast away הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> which king אָחָ֧ז <WH271> Ahaz בְּמַלְכוּת֛וֹ <WH4438> in his reign בְּמַעֲל֖וֹ <WH4604> in his transgression הֵכַ֣נּוּ <WH3559> have we prepared וְהִקְדָּ֑שְׁנוּ <WH6942> and sanctified וְהִנָּ֕ם <WH2005> behold לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> and behold they [are] before מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> the altar יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD ס

וַיַּשְׁכֵּם֙ <WH7925> rose early יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַיֶּאֱסֹ֕ף <WH622> and gathered אֵ֖ת <WH853> שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> the rulers הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> of the city וַיַּ֖עַל <WH5927> and went up בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> to the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיָּבִ֣יאוּ <WH935> And they brought פָרִים־ <WH6499> bullocks שִׁבְעָה֩ <WH7651> seven וְאֵילִ֨ים <WH352> rams שִׁבְעָ֜ה <WH7651> and seven וּכְבָשִׂ֣ים <WH3532> lambs שִׁבְעָ֗ה <WH7651> and seven וּצְפִירֵ֨י <WH6842> he עִזִּ֤ים <WH5795> goats שִׁבְעָה֙ <WH7651> and seven לְחַטָּ֔את <WH2403> for a sin offering עַל־ <WH5921> for הַמַּמְלָכָ֥ה <WH4467> for the kingdom וְעַל־ <WH5921> and הַמִּקְדָּ֖שׁ <WH4720> and for the sanctuary וְעַל־ <WH5921> and יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> and for Judah וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he commanded לִבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> the sons אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> of Aaron הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> the priests לְהַעֲל֖וֹת <WH5927> to offer עַל־ <WH5921> on מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> [them] on the altar יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַֽיִּשְׁחֲטוּ֙ <WH7819> So they killed הַבָּקָ֔ר <WH1241> the bullocks וַיְקַבְּל֤וּ <WH6901> received הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> and the priests אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> the blood וַֽיִּזְרְק֖וּ <WH2236> and sprinkled הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <WH4196> [it] on the altar וַיִּשְׁחֲט֣וּ <WH7819> likewise when they had killed הָאֵלִ֗ים <WH352> the rams וַיִּזְרְק֤וּ <WH2236> they sprinkled הַדָּם֙ <WH1818> the blood הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <WH4196> upon the altar וַֽיִּשְׁחֲטוּ֙ <WH7819> they killed הַכְּבָשִׂ֔ים <WH3532> also the lambs וַיִּזְרְק֥וּ <WH2236> and they sprinkled הַדָּ֖ם <WH1818> the blood הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <WH4196> upon the altar
